Wisdom floods your mind, revealing the cosmos’s secrets—sometimes you see the most vulnerable area of your foe’s defenses as you strike.

Constant Benefits: When you make a knowledge check, roll two checks and take the best result.

Divine Manifestation ✦ Encounter (Free Action)

Trigger: You have rolled damage for a divine encounter or daily attack power.

Effect: Reroll any number of that power’s damage dice.

Quirks: Distracted, intellectual, studious

Published in Dragon Magazine 382, page(s) 57.
